name: The Ankler
headline: Subscription entertainment news
description: The Ankler is subscription news for the entertainment industry so good that everyone from CEOs to creators pay to consume it every day.

founders.name: Janice Min, Founder
founders.description: Janice Min is CEO and Editor in Chief of Ankler Media, a network of essential newsletters, podcasts and events covering the entertainment industry and home to The Ankler flagship newsletter.

founders.name: Richard Rushfield, Founder
founders.description: Founder and author of The Ankler newsletter.  Journalist, author and editor.

generated_description:
**The Ankler: A Fresh Voice in Entertainment News**

Founded in 2022 and based in Los Angeles, The Ankler has quickly positioned itself as a must-read source for the entertainment industry, offering subscription-based news that caters to everyone from CEOs to creators. With over 127,000 subscribers, it's evident that they are filling a critical gap in the market.

The Ankler prides itself on delivering insightful and engaging coverage of the entertainment landscape—not just reporting on what's happening but diving into the context and implications of industry movements. The accolades are rolling in, with notable figures like Kareem Abdul-Jabbar praising its "excellent coverage" and David Chen calling it "a must-subscribe for anyone who wants to know the actual state of the entertainment industry."

What makes The Ankler intriguing is its origins. It was launched as part of Y Combinator’s Winter 2022 batch, an accelerator known for nurturing innovative startups. This affiliation gives it a bit of a tech startup vibe but with a distinct focus on content and media—a refreshing blend that's attractive in today’s digital age.

The company is small but mighty, with a two-person team led by Brad Flora, who serves as their Group Partner. Despite its size, The Ankler has big aspirations and is actively engaging with audiences through various formats, including articles, podcasts, and newsletters that cover a broad range of topics from Hollywood trends to critical analyses of media strategies.

If you want to stay ahead in the entertainment game, The Ankler is the place to start. They’ve wrangled a unique position in an ever-changing industry landscape, providing insights and stories that are smart, funny, and well-sourced. You can check them out at their website: [theankler.com](https://theankler.com).
